scripts.?dev: Launch the application in development mode.
scripts.?dev:debug: Launch the application in development mode, with debugging enabled.
scripts.?format:check: Check that all source files are formatted correctly with Prettier.
scripts.?format:write: Format all incorrectly-formatted source files and writes them to disk.
scripts.?next:start: Start the application in production mode. Must run "build" first.
scripts.?start: Start the application in production mode.
